What It Is: Pollen pellets are trapped at the entrance and dried for use as a protein-rich supplement.
Harvesting & Processing: Fit traps with care to avoid stress; collect frequently; dry at low heat to prevent mould; store airtight.
Properties & Uses: Amino acids, lipids, and micronutrients vary by flora; customers seek local, seasonal mixes.
Market & Value: Food safety and moisture control are key; small jars with batch labels suit farm-shop sales.
